nodes.text: Sip-packs were a type of drink container used during the reign of the New Republic. In 43 ABY, the Mind Walkers Rolund and Rhondi Tremaine drank hydrade from sip-packs while on board the Horizon-class star yacht, Jade Shadow.
Sip-packs first appeared in the 2009 novel Fate of the Jedi: Abyss written by Troy Denning as the third installment of the Fate of the Jedi series.
